first_interaction.speaker: Jacob
first_interaction.text: Hello! Parang ngayon lang kita nakita dito. May kailangan ka ba o nag-eexplore ka lang?

first_interaction.speaker: Jacob
first_interaction.text: Kung may problema ka o may gusto kang malaman, huwag kang mahihiyang sabihin sa akin.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Jacob
repeated_interaction.text: Uy, ikaw na naman! Kumusta ang araw mo?

repeated_interaction.speaker: Jacob
repeated_interaction.text: Huwag kang mahihiya, sabihin mo lang kung may kailangan ka pa.
